creditline: Gift of H.M. Lissauer, Melbourne, Australia
description: framed blue and white tile; 2 figures wearing knee-length garments and carrying fruits on a stick held on their shoulders; tree and foliage in L background and tents at R; circular border with flowers in corners
markings: \'NUM. 13:29\', in blue, at bottom of image; \'1850\' and framing co. label, on stickers, on back
title: "Spies Returning from Canaan" tile
